meaningMnemonic: Maybe you didn't know this, but if you're like everyone else learning a new language, you learn the cuss words first. くそ is sh*t / garbage, though it's not really a "bad" word in Japanese like it is in English. So, what is your <kanji>nose</kanji> sh*t? It's your <vocabulary>snot</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>boogers</vocabulary>. Ewwww, stop eating them!
readingMnemonic: The reading is just like what you learned with the kanji. <reading>はな</reading>くそ.
